text: If you were wondering, I’m not rooting for the Brooklyn Nets. I used to like KD when he was at Oklahoma but lost interest when he went to Golden State, which was already a dominant franchise. Where's the sport in a superstar like Durant joining an all-star team. I’ve always thought Kyrie is an ass. It is not about winning it’s about philosophy, especially in New York. I wish them the best but they’re not my team
